trans-unit.source: Creates and deletes Internet Information Services (IIS) 6.0 virtual roots.
trans-unit.target: Crea ed elimina le radici virtuali di IIS (Internet Information Services) 6.0.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot> interface defines methods for creating and deleting virtual roots in IIS 6.0.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot> interfaccia definisce i metodi per la creazione e l'eliminazione delle radici virtuali in IIS 6.0.

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented only by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot> class and is used only within the .NET Framework infrastructure while creating a SOAP-enabled COM+ application virtual root.
trans-unit.target: Questa interfaccia è implementata solo per il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot> e viene utilizzata solo all'interno dell'infrastruttura di .NET Framework durante la creazione di un'abilitato per SOAP COM+ radice dell'applicazione virtuale.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot> does not need to be implemented directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot> non devono essere implementati direttamente nel codice.

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> class, which implements the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher> interface that contains the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> and <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare invece il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> classe che implementa il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher> interfaccia che contiene il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> e <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: However, <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> is not fully implemented by <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> non è completamente implementato dalla <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot> is used internally by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot> viene utilizzata internamente da .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use it directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: Non è necessario utilizzarla direttamente nel codice.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot" />.

trans-unit.source: A string with the value <c>"IIS://localhost/W3SVC/1/ROOT"</c> representing the root Web server.
trans-unit.target: Stringa con il valore <c>"IIS://localhost/W3SVC/1/ROOT"</c> che rappresenta il server Web radice.

trans-unit.source: The physical path of the virtual root, which corresponds to <c>PhysicalPath</c> from the <see cref="M:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot(System.String,System.String,System.String@,System.String@,System.String@,System.String@)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: La parte fisica della radice virtuale, che corrisponde a <c>PhysicalPath</c> nel metodo <see cref="M:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot(System.String,System.String,System.String@,System.String@,System.String@,System.String@)" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the virtual root, which corresponds to <c>VirtualRoot</c> from <see cref="M:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot(System.String,System.String,System.String@,System.String@,System.String@,System.String@)" />.
trans-unit.target: Nome della radice virtuale, che corrisponde a <c>VirtualRoot</c> in <see cref="M:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot(System.String,System.String,System.String@,System.String@,System.String@,System.String@)" />.

trans-unit.source: A string to which an error message can be written.
trans-unit.target: Stringa in cui è possibile scrivere un messaggio di errore.

trans-unit.source: Creates an Internet Information Services (IIS) virtual root.
trans-unit.target: Crea una radice virtuale di IIS (Internet Information Services).

trans-unit.source: You do not need to call the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot.Create%2A> method from your code.
trans-unit.target: Non è necessario chiamare il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot.Create%2A> metodo dal codice.

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare invece il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The root Web server, as specified by <c>RootWebServer</c> from the <see cref="M:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot(System.String,System.String,System.String@)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Server Web radice specificato da <c>RootWebServer</c> nel metodo <see cref="M:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot(System.String,System.String,System.String@)" />.

trans-unit.source: The physical path of the virtual root.
trans-unit.target: Percorso fisico della radice virtuale.

trans-unit.source: The name of the virtual root.
trans-unit.target: Nome della radice virtuale.

trans-unit.source: A string to which an error message can be written.
trans-unit.target: Stringa in cui è possibile scrivere un messaggio di errore.

trans-unit.source: Deletes an Internet Information Services (IIS) virtual root.
trans-unit.target: Elimina una radice virtuale di IIS (Internet Information Services).

trans-unit.source: Even though it is public, the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot.Delete%2A> method is not intended to be called directly.
trans-unit.target: Anche se è pubblico, il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot.Delete%2A> metodo non è destinato a essere chiamato direttamente.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, there is the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, è il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: However, this method is not fully implemented.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, questo metodo non è completamente implementato.
